name: Sombrous Sepulcher
description:
Shattered existences serve as symbols of ultimate closure. Across the ethereal expanse, spirits cast their gaze upon the mortal realm, their eyes reflecting the etchings of oblivion and separation.
Innocent souls slumber within the Sombrous Sepulcher. Defeat the Tomb to awaken them.

skills.name: Slumber Awakening
skills.description: After Sombrous Sepulcher receives a killing blow, dispels Morbid Dream from the corresponding target, restoring their HP and regenerating Energy.

skills.name: Temporal Departure
skills.description: Sombrous Sepulcher will not take action.

skills.name: Eternal Continuation
skills.description: Sombrous Sepulcher has a fixed amount of HP bars. Each time it is attacked, Weakness Broken, or receives DMG from DoT, 1 bar of HP will be depleted.
